title: Add package tracking to orders
content:
FeedbackHomeOnlineIn-PersonMultiparty3rd PartyPayoutsDisputesReportsIdentityDocs ArchiveVideoAdd Package TrackingOrders APITracking APIReferenceHome/ Add Package Tracking OpenAI iconAsk ChatGPTAdd package tracking to ordersAPICurrentLast updated: Aug 15th, 7:07amThere are 2 ways to add package tracking to orders. The integration method you use depends on your checkout integration:

If you are using the Orders v2 API, integrate package tracking directly through the Orders v2 API.
If you have a legacy integration that doesn't use the Orders v2 API, integrate package tracking through the Add Shipping Tracking API.
